StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DBA_Ac.vity]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@rs_mcc varchar(3) as
DECLARE @table_name varchar(40), @sql_string nvarchar(700)
create table temp_user_login ( TABLE_NAME varchar(40), USER_COUNT int )
declare whoson cursor for select name from sysobjects where xtype = 'U' and name not like '%n.ict%' order by name
open whoson
fetch whoson into @table_name
while (@@fetch_status = 0) begin
set @sql_string = 'insert into temp_user_login select "'+ @table_name +'" ,count(*) from ['+ @table_name + '] where user_login in (select user_id from user_list where user_id in (select user_id from user_list where mcc_Code = "'+ @rs_mcc +'")) '
execute sp_executesql @sql_string
fetch whoson into @table_name end close whoson deallocate whoson select * from temp_user_login drop table temp_user_login
